system.effect: Provides +5 to BS Tests to Fire Macrocannons and Lances on the vessel (but not other weapon types). Poor Craftsmanship only benefits a single weapon chosen on installation (could pick it up multiple times for multiple weapons), Good and Best have no further bonuses. Only one per vessel.
